summary: Provides example scripts for training and running inference with a ControlNet‑enhanced text‑to‑image diffusion model using the Megatron framework. The training script configures a customizable training loop with Hydra and experiment management, while the inference script loads a pretrained model, processes textual prompts and optional control inputs (e.g., edge maps), executes a diffusion sampler, and saves the generated images.
business_intent: Showcase how to fine‑tune and deploy a ControlNet‑augmented text‑to‑image generation system, allowing developers to train the model on custom datasets and generate images conditioned on prompts and auxiliary control signals.
